title: Wire up FO-08 page and layout
description:
Update the FO-08 page and layout to use the fo-experience component.

Files to update:
- app/fo-08/page.tsx
- app/fo-08/layout.tsx
- app/fo-08/fo-08-layout-client.tsx

Implementation:
1. page.tsx should render FOExperience component
2. layout.tsx should use FO08LayoutClient
3. fo-08-layout-client.tsx should provide proper layout wrapper

Do not close this tick until the main experience renders without errors.
closed_reason: FO-08 page and layout already properly wired - page.tsx imports/renders FOExperience, layout.tsx uses Fo08LayoutClient
